0100100111110011 1111000100101001 1 -> sum: 0011101100011101, cout: 1

1110000101000000 0011110010000110 0 -> sum: 0001110111000110, cout: 1

1100000110101010 1011111110010010 1 -> sum: 1000000100111101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
